actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported to House from the Committee on the Judiciary with amendment, H. Rept. 93-1320.
Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Judiciary, S. Rept. 93-1204.

official_title: An Act to amend the Military Personnel and Civilian Employees' Claims Act of 1964, as amended, with respect to the settlement of claims against the United States by members of the uniformed services and civilian officers and employees for damage to, or loss of, personal property incident to their service.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Increases the maximum amount receivable to $15,000 for the settlement of claims against the United States by military personnel and civilian employees for damage to, or loss of, personal property incident to their service, under the Military Personnel and Civilian Employees' Claims Act of 1964.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Military Personnel and Civilian Employees' Claims Act of 1964 as amended, with respect to the settlement of claims against the United States by civilian officers and employees for damage to, or loss of, personal property incident to their service.

An Act to amend the Military Personnel and Civilian Employees' Claims Act of 1964, as amended, with respect to the settlement of claims against the United States by members of the uniformed services and civilian officers and employees for damage to, or loss of, personal property incident to their service.
